# Time picker

  • Simple time picker
<date-picker v-model="time" type="time" />
  • Time minimum and maximum
<date-picker
  type="time"
  v-model="time"
  min="08:08"
  max="22:00"
/>
  • Advance time picker
<date-picker
  v-model="time"
  type="time"
  :jump-minute="15"
  :round-minute="true"
/>
